= Introduction =

My list of starred Google Projects is already full so I decided to move it into here. So here is a list of Google Code Projects that I consider to be useful.


= Workflow =

Fabrication
http://code.google.com/p/fabrication/

Important Fabrication Features:
  * Elimination of the application specific facade
  * Reflexive Mediator registration
  * Reflexive Notification handlers
  * Automatic multi-module piping and message routing
  * Support for different types of Undo/Redo
